result.reason: Valid enhancement to improve usability in full-screen mode by providing standard window controls for mouse users.
result.approach: Modify FullscreenHandler or frmMain to display a custom overlay or toolbar with Minimize, Restore, and Close buttons when the application is in full-screen mode, linking them to the appropriate window state actions.
